title: Fully homomorphic encryption and the dawn of a private internet
author: barisozmen
aiHeadline: Fully homomorphic encryption finally arrives, promising a private internet—because apparently, we've been waiting for this since the dawn of time.

title: lsr: ls with io_uring
author: mpweiher
aiHeadline: lsr: ls with io_uring—because apparently, the old 'ls' command was just too slow for your cutting-edge needs. Now you can list files with the speed of light, or something like that.

title: NIH is cheaper than the wrong dependency
author: todsacerdoti
aiHeadline: NIH is cheaper than the wrong dependency—because who needs third-party libraries when you can just reinvent the wheel and save a few bucks? Innovation at its finest!

title: NYPD bypassed facial recognition ban to ID pro-Palestinian student protester
author: dataflow
aiHeadline: NYPD bypasses facial recognition ban to ID pro-Palestinian student protester—because when the law says 'no,' the NYPD says 'challenge accepted.'

title: Psilocybin decreases depression and anxiety in cancer patients (2016)
author: Bluestein
aiHeadline: Psilocybin decreases depression and anxiety in cancer patients—because what better way to cope with cancer than to trip your way to happiness? Science, you're weird.
